xxtt.1: Put a lumen extract and 1000mb of sulfuric acid into a work basin and right click the blender to get 1000mb of heavy water
xxtt.2: Drop a crying obsidian and 1000mb of sulfuric acid into a work basin and right click with a blender to get 1000mb of lava
xxtt.3: Put a flaming cake and 1000MB of sulfuric acid into a work basin and right click with a blender to get 1000MB of Flaming Man blood
xxtt.4: Put a rotten flesh and 1000mb of sulfuric acid into a work basin and right click with a blender to get 1000mb of blood
xxtt.5: Put a honeycomb and 1000mb of sulfuric acid in a work basin and right click with a blender to get 1000mb of liquid ethylene
xxtt.6: Put a charcoal and 1000mb of sulfuric acid into a work basin and right click the blender to get 1000mb of creosote
xxtt.7: Put a piece of gravl and 1000mb of sulfuric acid into the work basin and right click the blender to get 1000mb of concrete
banTiaoXiang.say: You need to make a blueprint, put a display pad in it, put whatever you want in the display pad, and then put me next to my brother's blueprint gun, and then deploy the blueprint gun, and you get what you want!
